item.title: A Post About Alcohol
item.description: I started taking part in the #Tidytuesday challenge and have had a great time so far, working through the challenges and learning from others. I highly recommend getting involved, especially if youâ€™re just starting out with ggplot and R studio. This week the data came from a FiveThirtyEight article on alcohol consumption. The data looked like this. ## # A tibble: 193 x 5 ## country beer_servings spirit_servings wine_servings total_litres_of_~ ## <fct> <int> <int> <int> <dbl> ## 1 Afghanis~ 0 0 0 0 ## 2 Albania 89 132 54 4.
